QAPair.Question: What is (are) Metastasis ?
QAPair.Answer: Whether or not cancer cells spread to other parts of the body depends on many things, including: The type of cancer, The stage of the cancer, Original location of the cancer , Your body's natural defenses, such as the immune system, Treatment depends on the type of cancer and where it has spread.
